__e: Half the credit must go to Mr Mitchell.
- I'm good. Mitchell, what's wrong with you?
Hello, mister Mitchell, what can I do for you today?
Mr. Mitchell is dead and not party to these proceedings.
I guess that means Mitchell's back.
Rumor is Mr. Mitchell's walking the straight and narrow now.
Miss Mitchell and I have a lot to talk over.
Not sure if she's actually missing, but the girl says that she took a job out at that hotel in Mitchell, and she hasn't heard from her in weeks.
You are that new voice, Mr Mitchell. And now that I have found a man worthy enough to die for...
Mrs. Mitchell doesn't think he did, but that's only natural.
No, I know you and Mitchell aren't just roommates.
I think Mitchell may just be a work friend.
I read a thing that a woman columnist wrote about you one time and she said "Mitchum was born the kind of man that does not have to seek women because they come to him."
I was, but Mitchell Cook's party's on the same day.
